verses.verse: הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> Praise יָ֡הּ <WH3050> ye the LORD הַלְלִ֥י <WH1984> Praise נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> O my soul אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
אֲהַלְלָ֣ה <WH1984> will I praise יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּחַיָּ֑י <WH2416> While I live אֲזַמְּרָ֖ה <WH2167> I will sing praises לֵֽאלֹהַ֣י <WH430> unto my God בְּעוֹדִֽי׃ <WH5750> while

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּבְטְח֥וּ <WH982> Put not your trust בִנְדִיבִ֑ים <WH5081> in princes בְּבֶן־ <WH1121> [nor] in the son אָדָ֓ם ׀ <WH120> of man שֶׁ֤אֵֽין <WH369> there ל֥וֹ תְשׁוּעָֽה׃ <WH8668> in whom [there is] no help

תֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> goeth forth ר֭וּחוֹ <WH7307> His breath יָשֻׁ֣ב <WH7725> he returneth לְאַדְמָת֑וֹ <WH127> to his earth בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> in that very day הַ֝ה֗וּא <WH1931> he אָבְד֥וּ <WH6> perish עֶשְׁתֹּנֹתָֽיו׃ <WH6250> his thoughts

אַשְׁרֵ֗י <WH835> Happy שֶׁ֤אֵ֣ל <WH410> [is he] that [hath] the God יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> of Jacob בְּעֶזְר֑וֹ <WH5828> for his help שִׂ֝בְר֗וֹ <WH7664> whose hope עַל־ <WH5921> is in יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [is] in the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> his God

עֹשֶׂ֤ה ׀ <WH6213> Which made שָׁ֘מַ֤יִם <WH8064> heaven וָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> and earth אֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּ֥ם <WH3220> the sea וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בָּ֑ם הַשֹּׁמֵ֖ר <WH8104> and all that therein [is] which keepeth אֱמֶ֣ת <WH571> truth לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever

עֹשֶׂ֤ה <WH6213> Which executeth מִשְׁפָּ֨ט ׀ <WH4941> judgment לָעֲשׁוּקִ֗ים <WH6231> for the oppressed נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> which giveth לֶ֭חֶם <WH3899> food לָרְעֵבִ֑ים <WH7457> to the hungry יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD מַתִּ֥יר <WH5425> looseth אֲסוּרִֽים׃ <WH631> the prisoners

יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD פֹּ֘קֵ֤חַ <WH6491> openeth עִוְרִ֗ים <WH5787> [the eyes of] the blind יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> the LORD זֹקֵ֣ף <WH2210> raiseth כְּפוּפִ֑ים <WH3721> them that are bowed down יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אֹהֵ֥ב <WH157> loveth צַדִּיקִֽים׃ <WH6662> the righteous

יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD שֹׁ֘מֵ֤ר <WH8104> preserveth אֶת־ <WH853> גֵּרִ֗ים <WH1616> the strangers יָת֣וֹם <WH3490> the fatherless וְאַלְמָנָ֣ה <WH490> and widow יְעוֹדֵ֑ד <WH5749> he relieveth וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> but the way רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked יְעַוֵּֽת׃ <WH5791> he turneth upside down

יִמְלֹ֤ךְ <WH4427> shall reign יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD לְעוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> for ever אֱלֹהַ֣יִךְ <WH430> [even] thy God צִ֭יּוֹן <WH6726> O Zion לְדֹ֥ר <WH1755> unto all וָדֹ֗ר <WH1755> generations הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> ye the LORD
